personal_info.name: Tanvir Hasan
personal_info.about: Self-motivated and hardworking Android and Flutter developer. Dedicated to continuous learning, development, and implementation of new technologies to optimize the productivity of production and to deliver creative applications.

skill_set.name: Android
skill_set.details:
Have more than 5 years of experience with native Android.
And familiar with technology like Coroutine, Dagger 2, Hilt, Retrofit, Jetpack libraries, Glide, MVVM, etc

skill_set.name: Flutter
skill_set.details: Worked on numerous projects and have 4+ years of experience in it. Used technology like MVVM, GetX, Riverpod, Bloc, Isolates, etc

skill_set.name: Java
skill_set.details: Have 5+ years of experience in it. Mostly used java on native android development. Also tried java backend development framework like spring boot for the sake of interest.

skill_set.name: Kotlin
skill_set.details: Have more 3+ years of experience in it. Using Kotlin for native Android development.

skill_set.name: Dart
skill_set.details: Have 4+ years of experience in it. Mostly used this language with Flutter.

skill_set.name: C
skill_set.details: C is the first programming language that I have learned. Mostly used it for problem-solving.

skill_set.name: SqLite
skill_set.details: Used it with native android development to store data on local db.

skill_set.name: Firebase
skill_set.details: Used firebase service like authentication, notification, realtime database, crashlytics etc

skill_set.name: Git
skill_set.details: Using git for 6+ years to maintain versioning system of my projects. Used many cloud based platform like github, bitbucket, gitlab etc

projects.name: BRAC mHealth
projects.details: mHealth platform provides a digital solution for BRAC CHWs. The main goal of the app is to provide health care to rural areas people.

projects.name: InteleHealth
projects.details: This is a telemedicine app. This app's main purpose is to connect doctors in urban areas to patients in rural areas to provide healthcare.
projects.technology: Android, Java, RxJava, Coroutin, Dagger Hilt

projects.name: mSurvey
projects.details: This is an online survey management app. This can help an organization to collect surveys. So that they can analyze progress and growth.
projects.technology: Flutter, Dart, GetX, Platform Specific code, OpenODK (Open Data Kit)

projects.name: Khamar Bondhu
projects.details: Khamar Bondhu is a Khamar management app that can help farmers as their full-time assistants.

projects.name: Duck Management
projects.details: Khamar Bondhu is a Khamar management app that can help farmers as their full-time assistants.
